version_description:
- Added App Video Preview
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support
- Supports the new full screen resolutions
- Added new sizes for icons
- Added new sizes for screenshots
- iOS 8 support

- 3D Touch - press harder to turn more (requires 3D Touch compatible device).
- Themes - the most requested feature! Four beautiful colour schemes to enjoy.
- New settings menu.
- WONDERFUL LASERS splash screen.
- Fixed music not playing on some devices.

- Minor bug fixes

New in 1.3.0:
- 3D Touch - press harder to turn more (requires 3D Touch compatible device).
- Themes - the most requested feature! Four beautiful colour schemes to enjoy.
- New settings menu.
- WONDERFUL LASERS splash screen.
- Fixed music not playing on some devices.

- Improved performance on some devices
- New App Preview
- Added screenshots for iPad Pro with 12.9-inch display

- Minor bug fixes
- Changes to App Preview

- Support for iPhone X
- Changed dark theme to use 100% black background
- Removed logo splash screen for a cleaner experience
- New button designs in UI

- Support for iPhone X
- Changed dark theme to use 100% black background
- Removed logo splash screen for a cleaner experience
- New button designs in UI
